page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Many forms of recreation are to be found in the area or in neighbouring villages. These include outdoor act- ivities such as football,cricket, skiing,motorcross riding, motor bike trials, golf,trout fishing,horse riding,sulky racing,shooting, photo- graphy and the recently revived quoits.Indoor pursuits include carpet bowls,bridge, billiards, whist,bingo, darts and folk dancing. There are Brownies, Cubs, Guides,Scouts and Youth Clubs,Women's Institutes,Photo- graphic,Horticultural and Field Study Societies,Young Farmers and Motor Clubs,a pensioners' association and mother and toddler group. There is a recreation field at Wearhead and chil dren's playground at Ireshopeburn. Events include Agricultural and Hort- icultural shows, carnivals,sales of work and the Church garden party.
